definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: The incense floats , excellent music is beautiful , kind of milky tea had better immediately?
sentences.chinese: 香飘飘，优乐美，立顿，哪种奶茶最好？

sentences.english: And plus, a Lipton red tea bottle is on the cup holder.
sentences.chinese: 再加上，有一瓶“立顿”红茶在车上的杯架上。

sentences.english: Like you know, you have Earl Grey tea and the different Lipton tea.
sentences.chinese: 像你知道的一样，有伯爵茶和各种立顿茶。

sentences.english: The campaign features Takeshi Kaneshiro, Lipton's ambassador for the last two years.
sentences.chinese: 广告活动代言人金城武，是立顿过去两年的形象大使。

sentences.english: When he drinks Lipton's milk tea, something magical starts to happen.
sentences.chinese: 每当他喝立顿奶茶时，神奇的事情开始发生。

sentences.english: Now I like to drink Lipton tea with milk.
sentences.chinese: 现在的我喜欢喝立顿奶茶。

sentences.english: "Ignite your spirit" is the motto of Benedictine.

definition: genmaicha/Japanese tea with added roasted brown rice
Tieguanyin tea (a variety of oolong tea)
